amendment.description: To amend title XVII of the Social Security Act to provide for coverage of cardiovascular screening tests under the medicare program.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 993 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 993 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S8350; text: CR S8350) To amend title XVII of the Social Security Act to provide for coverage of cardiovascular screening tests under the medicare program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 993 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Dorgan.
